props.name: as
props.docblock: Specifies element type for this component.

description.text: Specifies element type for this component.

props.name: activeIndex
props.docblock: Controls the current visible slide. Defaults to `defaultActiveIndex` prop

description.text: Controls the current visible slide. Defaults to `defaultActiveIndex` prop

props.name: defaultActiveIndex
props.docblock: Specifies default active index prop

description.text: Specifies default active index prop

props.name: controls
props.docblock: Show the `Carousel's` previous and next arrows for changing the current slide.

description.text: Show the `Carousel's` previous and next arrows for changing the current slide.

props.name: fade
props.docblock: Animates slides with a crossfade animation instead of the default slide animation.

description.text: Animates slides with a crossfade animation instead of the default slide animation.

props.name: indicators
props.docblock: Show a set of slide position indicators.

description.text: Show a set of slide position indicators.

props.name: interval
props.docblock: The amount of time to delay between automatically cycling an item.

description.text: The amount of time to delay between automatically cycling an item.

props.name: keyboard
props.docblock: Specifies whether the `Carousel` should react to keyboard events.

description.text: Specifies whether the `Carousel` should react to keyboard events.

props.name: nextIcon
props.docblock: Override the default button icon for the "next" control

description.text: Override the default button icon for the "next" control

props.name: nextLabel
props.docblock: Label shown to screen readers only, can be used to show the next element in the `Carousel`

description.text: Label shown to screen readers only, can be used to show the next element in the `Carousel`

props.name: onSelect
props.docblock: Callback fired when the active item changes.

description.text: Callback fired when the active item changes.

props.name: onSlid
props.docblock: Callback fired when a slide transition ends.

description.text: Callback fired when a slide transition ends.

props.name: onSlide
props.docblock: Callback fired when a slide transition starts.

description.text: Callback fired when a slide transition starts.

props.name: pause
props.docblock:
If set to "hover", pauses the cycling of the `Carousel` on mouseenter and
resumes the cycling of the carousel on mouseleave.
If set to false, hovering over the `Carousel` won't pause it.

On touch-enabled devices, when set to "hover", cycling will pause on touchend
(once the user finished interacting with the `Carousel`) for two intervals,
before automatically resuming. Note that this is in addition to the above mouse behavior.

description.text:
If set to "hover", pauses the cycling of the `Carousel` on mouseenter and
resumes the cycling of the carousel on mouseleave.
If set to false, hovering over the `Carousel` won't pause it.

On touch-enabled devices, when set to "hover", cycling will pause on touchend
(once the user finished interacting with the `Carousel`) for two intervals,
before automatically resuming. Note that this is in addition to the above mouse behavior.

props.name: prevIcon
props.docblock: Override the default button icon for the "previous" control

description.text: Override the default button icon for the "previous" control

props.name: prevLabel
props.docblock:
Label shown to screen readers only, can be used to show the
previous element in the `Carousel`. Set to null to deactivate.

description.text:
Label shown to screen readers only, can be used to show the
previous element in the `Carousel`. Set to null to deactivate.

props.name: slide
props.docblock: Enables animation on the Carousel as it transitions between slides.

description.text: Enables animation on the Carousel as it transitions between slides.

props.name: touch
props.docblock: Whether the `Carousel` should support left/right swipe interactions on touchscreen devices.

description.text: Whether the `Carousel` should support left/right swipe interactions on touchscreen devices.

props.name: wrap
props.docblock: Whether the `Carousel` should cycle continuously or have hard stops

description.text: Whether the `Carousel` should cycle continuously or have hard stops

props.name: bsPrefix
props.docblock: Overrides underlying component base CSS class name

description.text: Overrides underlying component base CSS class name

props.name: as
props.docblock: Specifies element type for this component.

description.text: Specifies element type for this component.

props.name: interval
props.docblock:
The amount of time to delay between automatically cycling this specific item.
Will default to the `Carousel's` interval prop value if none is specified.

description.text:
The amount of time to delay between automatically cycling this specific item.
Will default to the `Carousel's` interval prop value if none is specified.
